main_definition: A remix is a version of an original song, audio recording or piece of media that has been altered, rearranged, or edited to create a new work.

meanings_and_examples.example: The DJ remixed the classic hit song for the dance floor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reinterpretation of an original work
meanings_and_examples.example: The artist's remix of a popular film soundtrack added new depth to the movie experience.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To combine or blend different elements together
meanings_and_examples.example: In music production, mixing and mastering can be considered as part of the remix process.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A creative reworking of an existing work
meanings_and_examples.example: The band released a new version of their song with additional lyrics and melodies to create a unique remix.
